# tenzing

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tenzing is to create an easy to use shiny app, that enables researchers to create reports about the contribution of each team member on a project.


## Installation

tenzing is not available on CRAN.
You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("marton-balazs-kovacs/tenzing")
```
